languages.text: {n}Вокс-машина искрит и захлебывается в агонизирующем хрипе. Импульс, убивающий машинных духов, искалечил ее, но она из последних сил продолжает извлекать из эфира призраки чужих голосов.{/n}

{n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-машина искрит и захлебывается в агонизирующем хрипе. Импульс, убивающий машинных духов, искалечил ее, но она из последних сил продолжает извлекать из эфира призраки чужих голосов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out sparks and wheezes in agony. The pulse that kills machine spirits has crippled it, but it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

{n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La máquina de voco vomita una lluvia de chispas y resuella, agónica. Aunque el pulso contra los espíritus máquina la ha dejado muy dañada, sigue extrayendo los espectros de las voces ajenas del éter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La máquina de voco vomita una lluvia de chispas y resuella, agónica. Aunque el pulso contra los espíritus máquina la ha dejado muy dañada, sigue extrayendo los espectros de las voces ajenas del éter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスマシンは火花を散らし、苦しそうに掠れた音を出す。機械精霊を痛めつける波動でダメージを受けたのか、エーテルから他の者の声の亡霊を吸収し続けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスマシンは火花を散らし、苦しそうに掠れた音を出す。機械精霊を痛めつける波動でダメージを受けたのか、エーテルから他の者の声の亡霊を吸収し続けている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台音阵机器喷射出一连串火花，发出了痛苦的喘息声。尽管脉冲消灭了它的机魂，但它依然从虚空之中提取着其他人声音的回响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台音阵机器喷射出一连串火花，发出了痛苦的喘息声。尽管脉冲消灭了它的机魂，但它依然从虚空之中提取着其他人声音的回响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vox-Maschine rülpst einen Funkenregen aus und keucht gequält. Obwohl sie von dem Puls verkrüppelt wurde, der Maschinengeister tötet, extrahiert sie weiterhin die Geister der Stimmen anderer aus dem Äther.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vox-Maschine rülpst einen Funkenregen aus und keucht gequält. Obwohl sie von dem Puls verkrüppelt wurde, der Maschinengeister tötet, extrahiert sie weiterhin die Geister der Stimmen anderer aus dem Äther.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La machine vox crache des étincelles tout en émettant une sorte de râle d'agonie. Bien que paralysée par l'impulsion fatale aux esprits de la machine, elle continue d'extraire de l'éther des voix fantômes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acı içinde sızlanan voks makinesinden kıvılcımlar fışkırıyor. Makine ruhlarını öldüren atım bu makineyi de yıpratmış ama eterden başka hayaletlerin seslerini vermeyi sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-machine belches out a shower of sparks and wheezes in agony. Although crippled by the pulse that kills machine spirits, it continues to extract the ghosts of other people's voices from the ether.{/n}
